CAPSTONE

Weather web app (PWA) finds forecast for the location and the date you submit.
Works with browser, tablet and phones.

Powered by:
  • APIs: Geonames, Weatherbit, Pixabay
  • Node.js (Express server, npm)
  • Webpack (loaders, plugins, SCSS, babel)
  • Heroku

NEWS EVALUATOR

Web app that takes an url as input and the NLP API evaluates the text context and irony.
Still a working progress, app without UX or UI

Powered by:
  • MeaningCloud API
  • Node.js (Express server, npm)
  • Webpack (loaders, plugins, SCSS, babel)

ROCK, PAPER, SCISSORS

The old chinese game.
Simple game, without any layout, written in Python and runned on terminal.

Powered by:
  • Python
  • Colorama
  • Udacity.com
